booking.title: Booking Widget
booking.description: Embeddable booking widget compiled with bundlers so that the application can be deployed on clients websites, from web applications to WordPress, enabling them to use our product to showcase their hotels and apartments in a format similar to Booking and Airbnb. Over 3000 reservations are made through the application.

checkin.title: Domotic Check-in Application
checkin.description: A web application that enables customers to check in for their reservations. We implemented an SDK to extract data from photos of identification documents such as ID cards, passports, and driver's licenses. Integrated with smart locks, allowing customers to access their accommodations through the application without the need for keys. The application manages over 6000 apartments/hotels.

pms.title: PMS/Channel Manager
pms.description: A web application with a Windows-like interface for hotel/apartment management, utilizing React and Redux for state management and advanced optimization tools such as reselect. We created a WebSocket backend microservice using Node.js/Express to provide users with real-time collaboration features similar to Figma or Google Docs. The application is used by over 150 hotel/apartment managers.

leaderslinked.title: Leaders Linked
leaderslinked.description: Development and migration of a private professional social network for the company previously developed in a monolithic PHP project to the React ecosystem. Using bundlers to achieve a gradual integration to the monolithic architecture to finally separate the frontend from the PHP backend.

aboutMe.title: About me
